Subject: DrillBit Arrives At The Meeting
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

OOC: Cyber Wolf, did one of those babys drop on DrillBit? I wasn't sure
if got on him or not in that one post.

::DrillBit::

He made his way to Killfest's room. He knocked.
"It's me."
He was keeping an eye out for Megatrons troops.
